title: Snowbirds down Wolverine to repeat as district champs
content: EAST JORDAN – For the third-straight season, the No. 4 St. Mary baseball team is returning to the Division 4 regional.             The Snowbirds (23-5) scored 12 runs in the first inning, which included a two-run double from Steven Koscielniak, and downed Wolverine 18-0 to repeat as district champions Saturday.             They'll face either Glen Lake or Lake Leelanau St. Mary in the regional semifinal at 12:45 p.m. Saturday, June 9, in Maple City.      Drew Koenig struck out six Wildcats.
